This folder contains actual transcripts or recordings of public meeting that were downloaded the Internet. They come from the city government websites, Youtube videos, local TV websites, etc.

Austin TX  
	http://www.austintexas.gov/department/closed-caption-transcripts
	http://www.austintexas.gov/department/city-council/council-meetings
Philadelphia PA
	http://legislation.phila.gov/council-transcriptroom/transroom_date.aspx
	http://legislation.phila.gov/council-transcriptroom/transroom_committee.aspx
